lender.name: Andrej
lender.loan_because: I was lucky to be born into a rich country, and I would like to share some of that with people in regions less privileged. Helping or empowering others also makes me more happy on a personal level.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I believe in people with enthusiasm and a strong will to change their situation to their own benefit and the benefit of their surrounding.
lender.occupational_info: I am head of the staff administration of a church in Germany. Our main subject is the support of kids with disadvantages and behavior problems. We have about 500 employees in southern Germany

lender.name: Angelika
lender.loan_because: I like to support people who have ideas and do something useful.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the administration of a university.

lender.name: Jan C
lender.loan_because: it helps the third World

lender.name: Rowena
lender.loan_because: Jemandem helfen, damit er sich selbst helfen kann, finde ich viel wirkungsvoller als "nur" spenden.

lender.name: Zara & Glenn
lender.loan_because: We loan because we believe in the impact small loans can make!

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of many people working together in small ways to produce big changes.
lender.occupational_info: I work on public policy issues in Washington DC.

lender.name: sekhar kamma
lender.loan_because: cool
lender.occupational_info: cool

lender.name: sukma
lender.loan_because: As a freelancer sales, I want to have merchandise stock optimally. Until now I have gotten the merchandise from buying at grocery agent or distributor branch, and a half of that from borrowing from my friend in one day. And that merchandise is enough to carried by my old motorbike once in a day. Sometimes merchandise which my customers need are not ready at grocery agent, distributor branch or my friend's store stock, so I can not work optimally the profit is fall. As long as I know, I need add more capital. That is why I need soft loan to leverage my work. Not only that, I can increase to get new customers again. The next, I can open a small store step by step, because I have a lot of merchandise stock. That is my dream.
lender.occupational_info: I work about 10 hours every day. I carry merchandise by my old motorbike go around my town and suburb. I call to my customers for selling. Every morning I take merchandise from my friend's store, then I go to some grocery agent and / or distributor branch to buying some merchandise which my customers need. After that I go to my customers outlet. Majority of my merchandise are snack, only a little of beverage, sometimes bring some little toys too. Most of my customers market segment are children. Because the children have high frequency for buying them. In the afternoon I come back to my boarding house, because I do not have house. Every month I pay a rent fee.Tomorrow morning I go to my friend's store for calculation how much the merchandise I brought yesterday sold, then I pay to my friend a sum of merchandise sold. I might take again some merchandise I need.

lender.name: Patty & Alex
lender.loan_because: We love Jesus and people and we like to help if it is possible. The idea is absolutely great.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.occupational_info: Carpenter, capentaro

lender.name: Ilaria
lender.loan_because: I believe we should teach people in need how to work, how to build up an activity allowing them to create their future by themselves, with no need of external help from rich countries. This could motivate them, their dignity, cause it is not easy for a man to realize he is not able to feed his family by himself...
lender.occupational_info: I deal with toys! 40 years ago my dad, by using ONLY his strenght and very few money he got, built a company producing plastic educational & school items: rulers, triangles, exc. Now he is still the boss, and we also produce plastic educational toys, artists products exc. My job consists in selling these items to foreign people.

lender.name: jafar
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Christian-Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world to become better living conditions. And I like to see how they are successful trusting in their own power when they get a little activation energy.
lender.occupational_info: Managing Computers, networks and helping people working with this technology. The technical part is rather simple. the human part mostly more difficult and challenging.

lender.name: Ruediger

lender.occupational_info: I work for my church office making sure that all donations are accounted for properly and I pay all the bills.

lender.loan_because: It's a realy easy way to help people on the other side of the world.

lender.name: Vivienne & Stephan
lender.loan_because: We are excited about the simple way to help people effectively.

lender.occupational_info: We meet on Sundays to share and discuss ways to help save the world.

lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be blessed with a good life and would like to help others fullfill their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Kindergarten Teacher. I teach reading, writing, math, and lots more to about 20 young children each day. I love it!

lender.loan_because: Do not withhold good from those who deserve it, when it’s in your power to help them. [Proverbs 3:27]

lender.loan_because: Intelligently assist countries in developing

lender.name: Israa
lender.loan_because: I believe this concept is so incredibly empowering for entrepreneurs- it gives them a chance to break vicious cycles.
lender.occupational_info: I am an aspiring organizational development consultant- empowering organizations to cultivate leaders, managers, teams and individuals. I am also a musician- 100% of proceeds from my albums and concerts will be used to fund loans to entrepreneurs. Any repayments will be re-invested into my music. The cycle goes on :)

lender.name: Brian & Heather
lender.loan_because: We are both entrepreneurs who love to travel. We have seen the need first hand and appriciate how far our money can go to help other entrepreneurs get ahead.

lender.name: Abdullah
lender.loan_because: I know I can effect change through small actions.

lender.name: WMA
lender.occupational_info: Wilbraham & Monson Academy is a private day and boarding school for grades 6-12.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.occupational_info: Originally from Seattle, I now work with Karen refugees living along the Thai-Burma border.

lender.name: Keith
lender.occupational_info: Studying to become a physician.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women so they are able to experience the freedom of investing in themselves and help others in their country .
lender.occupational_info: My work helps people of all ages learn how to take better care of their teeth and oral health. I get to make people smile..

lender.name: Jim & Linda
lender.loan_because: We've travelled to third world countries and seen firsthand how a few dollars can help a KIVA entrepreneur improve their living situation.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in the greeting card business - I help people connect with their friends, family and clients by setting them up with an on-line greeting card system, but a REAL card is sent through the mail.

lender.name: Praveen
lender.loan_because: Giving is receiving

lender.name: Rick and Levonne
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to succeed and have a better life.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Many amazing people around the world are in need; bound by inequality, poverty and natural disasters to an existence where each day is a struggle to provide for themselves, their families, and their communities. My support represents a desire for a world with less hunger, poverty, and pain.

lender.name: Jaynna
lender.loan_because: I want people to be able to accomplish their ambitions to empower them to make their life their own.

lender.name: Teddi
lender.loan_because: I want to share the opportunities I have.

lender.name: Vienna
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a 9-year-old girl in California.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I love helping people.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: With a small investment I can help to make a big difference -- over and over again!
lender.occupational_info: I study the effects of climate change on the environment and develop strategies for protecting the earth's natural resources in a changing world.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.occupational_info: i work for an organization dedicated to improving the internet for people everywhere. we believe the internet is a shared public resource.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I realize the importance of the small business owner and the impact that financial independence provides to the individual.
lender.occupational_info: I provide cosmetic auto repair services to dealerships, auto insurance companies, body shops, rental car companies and private car owners.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I want to show love to others.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: With good plans, loans can be very helpful to people, although it involves risks. I enjoy challenging opportunities and would like to support others with theirs.
lender.occupational_info: Technology project people - to build business improvements using technology and people

lender.name: Joyce Noronha
lender.loan_because: life is about lifting the human spirit . Many people wanting support simply require an opportunity and someone to invest in them. I feel it is an honor to help.
lender.occupational_info:
I work as an administrator for a study abroad program. At a personal level, I have established a non profit organization to assist people learn about the disparities in the criminal justice system in the USA.
Some day I would hope that some of the people that have been given awful criminal charges for non violent crime and as a result cannot get decent jobs, can in fact get involved in setting up a business and lenders may help them move towards self sustenance.

lender.name: Emmanuel
lender.loan_because: Currently I am engage in a website base enterprise Known as "ENTREPRENEURS BUSINESS ALLIANCE IN THE PHILIPPINES" or eBAIPhils , I become interested t be part of KIVA to meet not only our finacial needs as a start- up company but most of all KIVA for us is indeed a promising partner in our business endeavor to help those SME's here in the Philippines particularly our Affiliates and or Alliances of Small medium enterprises.
lender.occupational_info: Our Vision and mission is clear and it is define clearly in one perspective "to help" the entrepreneurs here in the Philippines in the field of our expertise. KIVA has meet this perspective perfectly align with us.

lender.name: Nellie
lender.loan_because: being a single mother with a celebral palsied son, i want to support our needs though i have a single son working and my two other married children support us sometimes like our medicines for maintenance,foods,clothing etc. but does not enough, my active mind continue to work hard. i am now a single mother almost 8 years. i have still to continue to share my abilities, skills and talents, though i have some difficulties in my physical condition thinking that the worst is yet to come, i have to help people likewise myself and my son who is my responsibility. He is a bedridden 20 years old boy.Life goes on, we need to survive, i want to find a ways and means not begging for a long practical help from concerned community.i want to build my own concerned community those been affected any sort of survival.
lender.occupational_info: most of my time staying always at home,doing spirituality on line, i want to create a business on line. i have a community movement in our church related to the families - socio environment; socio-economics and spiritual awareness.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I believe that we should first help those who do not have the means to help themselves achieve a stable life before we worry about spending our time and money on useless means.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at a university in Toronto, Ontario, Canada; studying English and Communications.

lender.name: David
lender.occupation: Candidate for Master of Science in Finance

lender.name: Jim Farley
lender.loan_because: My wife gave me a Kiva certificate for Valentine's Day, 2009. She is so cool - what a loving gift! I love helping people around the world; going global - connecting cultures.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a performing arts and conference center, and county fair. I bring audiences and artists from across the globe together.

lender.name: Jess
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of micro lending. Still trying to decide if I think it makes any difference at all.
lender.occupational_info: I work mainly with traffic simulations

lender.name: Kevin

lender.name: Keith & Mel
lender.loan_because: We would like to use our wedding as a way of helping others build better lives, and better communities. The $100 million of loans that have been facilitated by Kiva has helped people to lift themselves out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: We will use any Kiva vouchers that are given to us for our wedding, to loan to people involved in a variety of projects around the world, and you will be able to keep track of our loans on this page.

lender.name: Herbert
lender.loan_because: With the advent of Kiva, pretty much anyone sitting anywhere with a keyboard can lend money to anyone across the planet. A wonderful innovation - get involved. (from DEAD AID by Dambisa Moyo)

lender.occupational_info: I support departments, which develop technical products. I do this by computer simulation of the future behaviour, lifetime and endurance of this products.

lender.name: Beni
lender.loan_because: I wanna help people to run their own indepedent business to get out of poverty. I am blessed to live in a very rich country by having many opportunities Blessing is nothing which is only for myself. So I use it.

lender.name: Jayson
lender.loan_because: i want to loan because i want to use it in my small business that i start but my funds was not enough so i need to loan to complete and to have nice and good income every day.
lender.occupational_info: my business is internet cafe,i have 5 set of computer set but need more equipment like scanner printer and more,so i can operate everyday in nice way,and also my costumer can relax while they renting computers in my shop.

lender.loan_because: to try to give people the opportunity I had.
lender.occupational_info: Right now, studying to become a film director. I'm learning about cameras, working with actors and every other detail about making movies.

lender.name: Louvah
lender.loan_because: I wish to go back to my Country to start up my own business,I decide to work as Expatrate because in My Country si very difficult to have a job ,I have been school,I got my Dilpoma and I have experiences professionals but I am Housemaid.I thave taken this decision because I though it si useful but now I realize that I have done a big mistake,I suffer so much,living far from family and completely alone noone around me,It is too hard,I would like to have a job as my career,If I got 15.000$ then I could start it up.
lender.occupational_info: My new business based in the show room of games as billards,babyfoot,plastationgames,karaoke,and with smallbar.it is a good business in My Country

lender.name: Aaron

lender.loan_because: I love the concept.
lender.occupational_info: I do computer technical support, and I have an interest in technology that makes life better or easier. I love to see people use the web to make real, substantiative connections.

lender.name: Nancie
lender.loan_because: I believe our God calls us to love our brothers & sisters around the world, to "pay it forward", and to make a difference (no matter how small).

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Im hoping to make a difference to someone less fortunate than myself.

lender.name: Rodrigo
lender.loan_because: hello all right? I opened my own business, seeking a financial independend, but due to lack of money in reserve for possible problems, I am experiencing hard times but I believe that my business and a promising business, work with fast food Brazilian, call pastel and meatballs filled with over three hundred opcion frosting. tale with the help of you to help me grow in my business and you will soon have good news. Thank you and God bless.
lender.occupational_info: my work and for very good and something new in my region. work more with family. where they can enjoy spending time with family, like any big city families are not having much time to get to the kitchen cook dinner, so this growing much fast food in my town! always dreamed of having my own business, and today I believe that with this program helped me a lot in this project!

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: To Help People in Need

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed and I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing Student

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to reach out and have impact. I am self employed and know that I have been successful with encouragement from others. Kiva is a way to pass that on.
lender.occupational_info: Never boring...

lender.name: Mette
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: Office job

lender.name: BRANDON
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance at their dream.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great idea to provide new enteprenours with free loans. A good way to give an helping hand to friends in need around the world. It is inspiring to see the very project that my investment is used for, and even payed back .
lender.occupational_info: Product designer and engineer. I create concepts of new products by sketching and CAD, and I engineer them for production.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves and I want to set an example of giving for my kids. I am making this loan on behalf of Guatemala Aid Fund.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I stay at home with my kids!

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I have seen the impact of microloans in developing nations and want to a part of it.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a university student studying geology in Utah, USA.

lender.name: storagepipe
lender.loan_because: We understand the importance that commerce in the proper growth and functioning of a society. Free enterprise gives the average person an opportunity to reach great heights, where their potential is limited only by their ingenuity and willingness to work hard. Since we've been so fortunate, we would love to share this good fortune with less privileged people who may have not been exposed to the same opportunities that we have. This loan should help change this in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: We are a company that helps computer users back up their data to another location far away. This way, they have a spare backup copy of their data in case something bad happens to their primary computer systems.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit and helping those who are willing to help themselves. My son introduced me to Kiva as an alternative to gift giving at the holidays.
lender.occupational_info: My work is aiding individuals in obtaining mortgage financing for their personal residence.

lender.name: JEROME & MARGARET
lender.loan_because: We can't repay those who helped us when we were in need, but we can help others.

lender.name: Chrissy
lender.loan_because: I'm able to.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I believe creative people need to be empowered to build something new. Micro-finance is an excellent mechanism to connect those in need with those with means.
lender.occupational_info: I help people become engaged in visioning future possibilities for the communities they live in.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves gives more than just money.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: we are called to care.

lender.occupational_info: I'm a teacher of languages, and a researcher. But I want to become a full-time humanitarian worker--soon, very soon.

lender.name: Nanny & the Boys

lender.occupational_info: I work with people to build them up to be the best possible human they can be.

lender.loan_because: we have to do what good we can with what time we have

lender.name: Jessica

lender.name: Patrick

lender.occupational_info: I work for the military.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I have received so many blessings in my life, and want to pay them forward. Kiva provides me a way to reach out directly to others in need.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
